description: Website valuation form submitted. Validate data, create CRM record, send acknowledgment, alert valuer.
Buyer enquiry from Rightmove/Zoopla. Generate personalized response, validate compliance, prepare negotiator brief.
New buyer registration. Verify financial status, check AIP, assess requirements, match to properties.
Prepare for valuation appointment. Research property, generate CMA, create marketing proposal.
On-demand valuation estimate. Fetch comparables, analyze market, provide price range.
Follow up after valuation. Generate thank you email, schedule callback, create nurture sequence if needed.
Complete new instruction onboarding. CRM record, EPC check, AML verification, description, buyer matching.
Verify EPC status via government API. Check validity, retrieve certificate details.
Run AML checks. Identity verification, address check, PEP screening, sanctions check.
Generate marketing description. Write compelling copy, validate compliance, approve for portals.
Launch property on portals. Verify materials ready, upload to all portals, notify matched buyers.
Search buyer database for matches. Apply criteria, score matches, prioritize contact list.
Retrieve and analyze portal performance stats. Compare to market averages.
Respond to buyer enquiry within 5 minutes. Generate email, prepare property brief, book viewing.
Prepare for scheduled viewings. Confirm with vendor, send buyer reminders, prepare property brief.
Collect and log viewing feedback. Analyze sentiment, update CRM, prepare vendor summary.
Aggregate all daily feedback. Identify patterns, flag concerns, prepare insights.
Generate comprehensive weekly vendor report. Activity stats, feedback analysis, recommendations.
Process price reduction. Update all portals, re-match buyers, notify interested parties.
Qualify received offer. Verify funds, check chain status, confirm solicitor, assess buyer strength.
Prepare offer presentation for vendor. Buyer analysis, market context, recommendation.
Process sale agreed. Congratulations calls, collect all party details, initiate handover.
Generate and distribute Memorandum of Sale to all parties.
Weekly progression update. Chase solicitors, check mortgage, update chain status, notify parties.
Monitor completion day, release keys, generate invoice, remove marketing, send thank you.
